info.description: This is the partner API. It is used to manage the channels
info.title: Whapi Partner

tags.name: Channels
tags.description: The channel is the main entity of the API.

projectId.description: Identifier for the project associated with the channel

prevRecurrentPaymentId.description: Identifier for the previous channel recurrent payment

blocked.description: Indicates if the channel is blocked

events.description:

"days" - Remaining days count lower than 7;
